com.plexus.debug
Class Assert

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.debug.Assert

public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object

Debugging tool that contains a bunch of static 'assertion' messages. This allows for programs to 'fail fast' when unexpected conditions arise, in stead of carrying on and failing later on in unexpected ways. Each method takes a message, this message should be written in a way that it allows to locate the failure point quickly, since no exceptions are thrown, no stacktrace is available.

Author:
plexus
